title: S16 Ep85: Severing Spirit Attachments with the Living & The Dead w/Echo Bodine & Jamie Houk
itunes:title: Severing Spirit Attachments with the Living & The Dead w/Echo Bodine & Jamie Houk
description:
Darkness Radio presents Severing Spirit Attachments with the Living & The Dead with Echo Bodine & Jamie Houk

Tonight we discuss the connections we make to the living and the dead and how to severe those ties without losing the love that remains. Can the dead truly affect us mentally and physically, can our love lines to people we meet each day do the same?

Special guests, Echo Bodine and Jamie Houk join Dave in this roundtable discussion to discuss the sometimes terrifying reality of spiritual attachments of the living and the dead.

We also invite you to join in with questions, thoughts and concerns.

Visit Echo here: www.EchoBodine.com

Visit Jamie here: www.IndigoSeeress.com
